definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Asparagaceae, family of flowering plants which includes asparagus

sentences.english: Lactose is also identified as the best carbon source while asparagine the best nitrogen source.
sentences.chinese: 同時確定了乳糖爲最佳碳源，天門冬素爲最佳氮源。

sentences.english: It is one of the two components of aspartame .
sentences.chinese: 它也是天門冬氨醯苯丙氨酸甲酯的兩種成分之一。

sentences.english: Poly(aspartic acid) is a new kind of biodegradable scale inhibitor and corrosion inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 聚天門冬氨酸是新一代可生物降解的綠色阻垢緩蝕劑。

sentences.english: Cyanide can serve as precursor for the amide nitrogen of asparagine .
sentences.chinese: 氰化物可以作一個天門冬酰胺的酰胺氮前體。
